f-string-converter-plus.ignorePatterns.description: Define file patterns to ignore when converting f-strings

f-string-converter-plus.supportSameTypeO.description:
Support the same type of quotes in f-strings. 
This setting changes the logic used for converting f-strings to a more experimental version, which allows the same type of quotes to be used inside of an f-string. 
If you don't need this functionality, it is highly recommended to keep this setting disabled. 

Examples:
f"{""}"
f'{''}'
